Restore Health for each champion hit.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Health and Ability Haste.</MainText>

active.name: Thirsting Slash
active.effects: Deal {{as|175% '''base''' AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 450 radius centered around you. {{tip|Heal}} for {{as|20% AD}} {{as|(+ 8% of your '''missing''' health)}} for each enemy champion hit.

passives.effects: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} grants you {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

7017.name: Deicide
7017.description:
6045025

passives.effects: After using an [[champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|160% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ {{rd|4%|2%}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}} as {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]], for a '''minimum''' of {{as|150% '''base''' AD}} and a '''maximum''' of {{as|250% '''base''' AD}} against monsters. If the target is a champion, {{tip|heal}} for {{as|88% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ {{rd|{{fd|2.2}}%|{{fd|1.1}}%}} of target's '''maximum''' health)|health}}.

Stacks expire by one every {{fd|0.5}} seconds when the duration ends.

active.name: Inspire
active.effects: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units {{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 4 seconds.

7021.name: Starcaster
7021.description:
65300200%25
  • Starlit Grace: Healing or shielding an ally chains to the nearest ally champion (excluding yourself), Healing or shielding based on the original amount Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Heal and Shield Power.

passives.effects: {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} an allied champion chains the effect to the other nearest allied champion within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 800 units of them (''excluding yourself''), granting them 35% of the heal or 40% of the shield. If no other allied champions are in the radius, grant the same target an additional 25% of the heal or 30% of the shield.

7023.name: Equinox

  • Coruscation: After Immobilizing champions or being Immobilized , cause that target and all nearby enemy Champions to take increased damage.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor and Magic Resist

7024.name: Caesura

7025.name: Leviathan

1050300%25
  • Colossal Consumption: Charge up a powerful attack against a champion over 3s while within 700 range of them. The charged attack deals 125 + 6% of your max Health as bonus physical damage, and grants you 10% of that amount as permanent max Health. (30s) cooldown per target.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 1%Increased Health &6%Champion Size.

passives.name: Colossal Consumption
passives.effects: While within 700 units of an enemy champion, generate a stack on them each second, stacking up to 3 times. Your next basic attack against a target with 3 stacks is empowered to consume them all to deal {{as|125|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 6% '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] and grant you permanent {{as|'''bonus''' health}} equal to{{ft|10% of that amount|{{as|{{ap|125*0.1}} (+ {{fd|0.6}}% '''maximum''' health)}}}}

7026.name: The Unspoken Parasite
7026.description:
405504025
  • Voidborn Resilience: For each second in champion combat gain a stack granting Armor and Magic Resist, up to 8 stacks max. At max stacks become empowered, instantly draining enemies around you for magic damage, Healing yourself, and increasing your bonus resist until end of combat.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor and Magic Resist .

passives.name: Voidborn Resilience
passives.effects: For each second in combat with champions, gain 2 {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}} for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a total of 16 '''bonus''' resistances. Upon reaching maximum stacks, instantly deal {{as|80|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 7% '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemy champions within 700 units and {{tip|heal}} for the same amount for each target damaged. You then increase your '''bonus''' resistances by 20% until the end of combat.

passives.effects: Upon casting your [[champion ability|ultimate]], you ''Transcend'' for 9 seconds. While ''Transcended'', increase your {{as|'''maximum''' health by {{fd|12.5}}%}} and cause you and all allies within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 1200 units to {{tip|heal}} for {{as|{{fd|2.5}}% of your '''maximum''' health}} upon you ''Transcending'' and every 3 seconds thereafter.

7028.name: Infinite Convergence

80550550This item gains 20 Health, 20 Mana and 4 Ability Power every 60 seconds up to 10 times, for a maximum of 200 Health, 200 Mana, and 40 Ability Power. Upon reaching max stacks, gain a level and all effects of Eternity are increased by 50%.

For every 200 Health or Mana restored this way, gain 35% Decaying Move Speed for 3 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

passives.effects: This item gains {{as|20 '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|20 '''bonus''' mana}}, and {{as|4 ability power}} every minute, up to 10 times, for a maximum of {{as|200 '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|200 '''bonus''' mana}}, and {{as|40 ability power}}. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (cap remains at level 18) and increase all effects of ''Eternity'' by 50%.

Shards will reset 3 seconds after dealing damage to an enemy champion.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Attack Damage.Ghosted units ignore collision with other units.

passives.name: Haunt
passives.effects: While moving, generate 1 ''Spectral Shard'' for every 55 units travelled. Gain {{as|{{fd|0.4}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} while out-of-combat for every ''Spectral Shard'', up to {{as|40 '''bonus''' movement speed}} with 100 ''Spectral Shards''. At maximum shards, also gain {{as|{{pp|7;8 to 18 for 11|1;8 to 18}} lethality}}. Dealing damage to an enemy champion causes ''Spectral Shards'' to reset after 3 seconds.

active.name: Wraith Step
active.effects: Gain {{as|25% '''bonus''' movement speed}} and {{tip|ghosted|ghosting}} for 6 seconds.

7031.name: Edge of Finality

65020Active - Vow: Choose a Nemesis to start building a Vendetta (90s).

Cannot be cast for 15 seconds while in-combat with champions."She swore to dedicate her life to his destruction. The gauntlets heard."

223161.name: Spear of Shojin
223161.description:
• Dragonforce: Your Non-Ultimate spells gain (8 (+0.08 per 100 Bonus AD) | 6 (+0.06 per 100 Bonus AD)) Ability Haste, reduced to (4 (+0.04 per 100 Bonus AD) | 3 (+0.03 per 100 Bonus AD))) Ability Haste for Immobilizing spells.
  • Exigency: Gain up to (0.15 | 0.1) increased move speed, based on your missing health (Maxed when below 33% Health).Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

223165.name: Morellonomicon
223165.description: • Affliction: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

223172.name: Zephyr
223172.description: • Like the Wind: Gain 5% Attack Speed On-Hit for 6 seconds, stacking up to 30% Attack Speed.Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun , Slow , Taunt , Fear , Silence , Blind , Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression .

223181.name: Hullbreaker
223181.description: • Solo Party: While no allied champions are nearby you gain Armor and Magic Resist and Attacks deal increased damage to towers.Solo Party's resistances decay over 3 seconds when an ally gets too close.

223190.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
223190.description:
Active - Devotion: Grant nearby allies a Shield, decaying over time.
  • Consecrate: Grant nearby allied champions Armor and Magic Resist.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor and Magic Resist increase to Consecrate .

223193.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
223193.description:
Active - Unbreakable: Gain a Shield that decays and grow in size.
  • Fortify: Taking damage from a champion grants a stack of bonus Armor and bonus Magic Resist.Max 5 stacks; 1 per champion.

223222.name: Mikael's Blessing
223222.description:
Active - Purify: Restore Health and Remove all crowd control debuffs (except Knockups and Suppression ) from an ally champion.
  • Harmony: Gain 25% Base Health Regeneration for every additional 25% Base Mana Regeneration .

223504.name: Ardent Censer
223504.description: • Sanctify: Healing or Shielding another ally enhances you both, granting Attack Speed and magic damage On-Hit.

223508.name: Essence Reaver
223508.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack deals additional damage and restores Mana.

223742.name: Dead Man's Plate
223742.description: • Shipwrecker: While moving, build up Move Speed. Your next Attack discharges built up Move Speed to deal damage. If dealt by a Melee champion at top speed, the Attack also Slows the target.''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake

223748.name: Titanic Hydra
223748.description:
• Colossus: Gain bonus Attack Damage based off of bonus Health.
  • Cleave: Attacks apply additional damage On-Hit, creating a shockwave that deals damage to enemies behind the target.

223814.name: Edge of Night
223814.description: • Annul: Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability.Item's cooldown is restarted if you take damage before it is completed.

224004.name: Spectral Cutlass
224004.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Soul Anchor: </Active>Mark your current location. After 5 seconds, return to that location (30s ).</MainText>

224005.name: Imperial Mandate
224005.description: • Coordinated Fire: Abilities that Slow or Immobilize a champion deal bonus magic damage and marks them. Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing additional magic damage and granting you both Move Speed.

224401.name: Force of Nature
224401.description:
• Absorb: Taking magic damage from enemy Champions grants a stack of Steadfast . Enemy Immobilizing effects grant additional stacks.
  • Dissipate: While at max stacks of Steadfast , gain increased Magic Resist and Move Speed.

224628.name: Horizon Focus
224628.description: • Hypershot: Damaging a champion with a non-targeted Ability at over 700 range or Slowing or Immobilizing them Reveals them and increases their damage taken from you.The Ability that triggers Hypershot also benefits from the damage increase. Pets and non-immobilizing traps do not trigger this effect. Only the initial placement of zone Abilities will trigger this effect. Distance is measured from the Ability cast position.

224629.name: Cosmic Drive
224629.description: • Spelldance: Damaging a champion generates a stack of 2.5% Move Speed every 1.5 seconds for the next 5 seconds up to 10% Move Speed. At 4 stacks, gain an additional 10% Move Speed (20% Move Speed total). Dealing damage refreshes this effect.

224633.name: Riftmaker
224633.description: • Void Corruption: For each second damaging enemy champions, deal bonus damage. At maximum strength, the bonus damage is dealt as true damage instead.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Omnivamp and Ability Power.

224636.name: Night Harvester
224636.description: • Soulrend: Damaging a champion with Attacks or Abilities deals additional magic damage and grants you Move Speed.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste.

224637.name: Demonic Embrace
224637.description:
• Azakana's Gaze: Dealing Ability damage burns enemies for max Health magic damage every second.
  • Dark Pact: Gain bonus Health as Ability Power.

224644.name: Crown of the Shattered Queen
224644.description: • Safeguard: You are Safeguarded, reducing incoming champion damage. Safeguard persists for 2.5 seconds after taking champion damage.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Move Speed and Ability Power.

224645.name: Shadowflame
224645.description: • Cinderbloom: Damage to champions benefits from additional Magic Penetration based on their current Health. If the target was recently affected by Shields, gain the maximum benefit against that target.

226035.name: Silvermere Dawn
226035.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Quicksilver: </Active>Remove all crowd control debuffs and gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance.</MainText>

226333.name: Death's Dance
226333.description:
• Ignore Pain: Damage taken is dealt to you over time instead.
  • Defy: Champion takedowns cleanse Ignore Pain's remaining damage pool and restore Health over time.

226609.name: Chempunk Chainsword
226609.description: • Hackshorn: Dealing physical damage applies 40%Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

226616.name: Staff of Flowing Water
226616.description: • Rapids: Healing or Shielding another ally grants you both Ability Power and Ability Haste.

226617.name: Moonstone Renewer
226617.description: • Starlit Grace: Healing or shielding an ally chains to the nearest ally champion (excluding yourself), Healing or shielding based on the original amount Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Heal and Shield Power.

226620.name: Echoes of Helia
226620.description:
• Soul Siphon: Damaging a champion grants a Soul Shard . Healing or Shielding an ally consumes all Soul Shards to restore Health and deals magic damage per Shard to the nearest enemy champion.
  • Dissonance: Gain Ability Power per Base Mana Regeneration . Disables Harmony.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste.

226630.name: Goredrinker
226630.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Thirsting Slash: </Active>Deal damage to nearby enemies. Restore Health for each champion hit.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Health and Ability Haste.</MainText>

226631.name: Stridebreaker
226631.description:
Active - Halting Slash: Deal damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them. Can be cast while moving.
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants Move Speed.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Move Speed.

226632.name: Divine Sunderer
226632.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional damage On-Hit. If the target is a champion, also heal.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor Penetration and Magic Penetration.

226653.name: Liandry's Anguish
226653.description:
• Agony: Deal bonus magic damage to Champions based on the target's bonus Health.
  • Torment: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn over time.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste.

226655.name: Luden's Tempest
226655.description: • Echo: Damaging Abilities deal magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you Move Speed. Dealing ability damage to Champions reduces this item's cooldown.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Magic Penetration.

226656.name: Everfrost
226656.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Glaciate: </Active>Deal damage in a cone, <Status>Slowing </Status>enemies hit. Enemies at the center of the cone are <Status>Rooted </Status>instead.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Ability Power.</MainText>

226657.name: Rod of Ages
226657.description:
After 2 combat rounds, this item gains 300 Health, 300 Mana, 40 Ability Power. In addition, gain a level and all effects of Eternity are increased by 50%.
  • Eternity: Restore Mana equal to 7% of premitigation damage taken from champions, and Health equal to 25% of Mana spent, up to 20 Health per cast, per second. For every 200 Health or Mana restored this way, gain 35% Decaying Move Speed for 3 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

226662.name: Iceborn Gauntlet
226662.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional damage and creates a frost field for 2.5s. Enemies that move across the field are Slowed . Your primary target is crippled, applying a 100% stronger slow on them and reducing their damage by 10% against you for 2.5s. (1.5s ).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 50 Health , 5%Tenacity, and 5%Slow Resist.

226664.name: Turbo Chemtank
226664.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Supercharged: </Active>Grants Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that <Status>Slows </Status>nearby champions.</MainText>

226665.name: Jak'Sho, The Protean
226665.description: • Voidborn Resilience: For each second in champion combat gain a stack granting Armor and Magic Resist, up to 8 stacks max. At max stacks become empowered, instantly draining enemies around you for magic damage, Healing yourself, and increasing your bonus resist until end of combat.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor and Magic Resist .

226667.name: Radiant Virtue
226667.description: • Guiding Light: Upon casting your Ultimate you Transcend, increasing your Max Health. While Transcended you and allies heal over time.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Health.

226671.name: Galeforce
226671.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Active>Active - Cloudburst: </Active>Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination. Deals physical damage, increased against low Health targets.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items <Attention>5</Attention>Attack Damage.<Rules>Maximum missile damage dealt when enemy Health is below 25%.Cloudburst's dash cannot pass through terrain.</Rules></MainText>

226672.name: Kraken Slayer
226672.description: • Bring It Down: Every third Attack deals additional physical damage. Repeated triggers on the same target increase the damage dealt.

226673.name: Immortal Shieldbow
226673.description: • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a Shield. In addition, gain Attack Speed.

226675.name: Navori Quickblades
226675.description:
• Transcendence: Your Attacks reduce your non-Ultimate Ability cooldowns.
  • Impermanence: Your abilities deal increased damage based on Critical Strike Chance.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Attack Damage.

226676.name: The Collector
226676.description: • Death and Taxes: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health executes them.

226691.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
226691.description: • Nightstalker: Your Abilities deal up to an additional percent damage based on the target's missing health. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, you become Untargetable from non-structures for 1.5 seconds (10s ).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste and Move Speed.

226692.name: Eclipse
226692.description: • Ever Rising Moon: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals additional damage, grants you Move Speed and a Shield.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor Penetration and Move Speed.

226693.name: Prowler's Claw
226693.description: • Sandstrike: After dashing, blinking, or exiting Stealth, your next Attack on a champion deals an additional physical damage. If dealt by a Melee champion, this Attack also Slows the target.

226695.name: Serpent's Fang
226695.description: • Shield Reaver: Dealing damage to an enemy champion reduces any shields they gain. When you damage an enemy who is unaffected by Shield Reaver, reduce all shields on them.Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

227001.description: • Ever Rising Moon: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals additional damage, grants you Move Speed and a Shield.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor Penetration and Move Speed.

(1.5s ).Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 50 Health , 5%Tenacity, and 5%Slow Resist.

Then, gain Move Speed towards enemy champions.<RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items Magic Penetration.</MainText>

  • Torment: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn over time.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste.

Active - Halting Slash: Deal damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them. Can be cast while moving.
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants Move Speed.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Move Speed.

227017.description: • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional damage On-Hit. If the target is a champion, also heal.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor Penetration and Magic Penetration.

227018.name: Infinity Force
227018.description:
• Threefold Strike: Attacks grant Move Speed. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage, stacking.
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional damage.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Attack Damage, Ability Haste, and Move Speed.

227019.name: Reliquary of the Golden Dawn
227019.description:
Active - Devotion: Grant nearby allies a Shield, decaying over time.
  • Consecrate: Grant nearby allied champions Armor and Magic Resist.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor and Magic Resist increase to Consecrate .

227020.name: Shurelya's Requiem
227020.description:
Active - Inspire: Grants nearby allies Move Speed.
  • Motivate: Empowering or Protecting another ally Champion grants both allies Move Speed.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste.

227021.name: Starcaster
227021.description: • Starlit Grace: Healing or shielding an ally chains to the nearest ally champion (excluding yourself), Healing or shielding based on the original amount Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Heal and Shield Power.

227023.name: Equinox
227023.description: • Coruscation: After Immobilizing champions or being Immobilized , cause that target and all nearby enemy Champions to take increased damage.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor and Magic Resist

227025.name: Leviathan
227025.description: • Colossal Consumption: Charge up a powerful attack against a champion over 3s while within 700 range of them. The charged attack deals 125 + 6% of your max Health as bonus physical damage, and grants you 10% of that amount as permanent max Health. (20s) cooldown per target.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 1%Increased Health &6%Champion Size.

At max stacks become empowered, instantly draining enemies around you for magic damage, Healing yourself, and increasing your bonus resist until end of combat.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Armor and Magic Resist .

After 2 combat rounds, this item gains 300 Health, 300 Mana, 40 Ability Power. In addition, gain a level and all effects of Eternity are increased by 50%.
  • Eternity: Restore Mana equal to 7% of premitigation damage taken from champions, and Health equal to 25% of Mana spent, up to 20 Health per cast, per second. For every 200 Health or Mana restored this way, gain 35% Decaying Move Speed for 3 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

227029.description:
Active - Wraith Step: Gain Move Speed and Ghosting.
  • Haunt: Gain up to 100 Spectral Shards while moving. Gain Move Speed out of champion combat based on the number of Spectral Shards. While at max Shards, gain Lethality. Shards will reset 3 seconds after dealing damage to an enemy champion.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Attack Damage.Ghosted units ignore collision with other units.

227030.name: Seething Sorrow
227030.description:
• Wrath: Attacks apply bonus damage On-Hit. Your Critical Strike Chance is converted into more.
  • Seething Strike: Basic attacks grant bonus Attack Speed, stacking up to a cap. While fully stacked, every third Attack applies your On-Hit effects twice.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5%Armor Penetration and 6%Magic Penetration.

227031.name: Edge of Finality
227031.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><RarityMythic>Mythic Passive: </RarityMythic>Grants all other <RarityLegendary>Legendary </RarityLegendary>items <Attention>5</Attention>Attack Damage.<FlavorText>One cut is all it takes.</FlavorText></MainText>

  • Impermanence: Your abilities deal increased damage based on Critical Strike Chance.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5Attack Damage.

  • Dissonance: Gain Ability Power per Base Mana Regeneration . Disables Harmony.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items Ability Haste.

228001.description:
Active - Vow: Choose a Nemesis (90s ).
  • Vendetta: Take reduced damage against your Nemesis. They have reduced Tenacity while near you.Active can be cast at global range."She swore to dedicate her life to his destruction..."

228020.name: Abyssal Mask
228020.description: • Unmake: Curse nearby enemy champions, reducing their Magic Resist. For each Cursed enemy, gain Magic Resist.
